name: Ee-Chien Chang
content: Chang Ee-Chien's Home Page Chang Ee-Chien Contact Info Link to department's directory Hi, I am an associate professor in the Department of Computer Science, School of Computing, National University of Singapore (NUS). I am a lead-PI in National Cybersecurity R&D Lab (NCL) since 2015. I was a deputy director in Center for Technology, Robotics, Artifical Integlligence and the Law (TRAIL) from 2019 to 2022. I chaired the Joint Academic Committee overseeing Bachelor of Computing in Information Secuirty programme from 2016 till Apr 2023. I obtained my B.Sc (Hons) in Math and MSc from NUS in 1991 and 1993 respectively. I obtained my Ph.d in May 1998 from the Department of Computer Science, New York University. I was a post-doc in DIMACS and NEC Research Institute from July 1999 to July 2000. Research interests Topics in Security. Recently has been working on Machine Learning security, Trusted Execution Environment and applied cyrptography. Earlier works include multimedia and biometric security. Research positions available in our group Our research group has a few research positions (Research Fellows, Research Assistants) available, looking for expertises in Security of AI, and AI for cybersecuity. Contact me for more info. National Cybersecurity R&D Lab invites applications for a number of positions, including software and system engineers. Publications Publications list Google Scholar dplb Professional Activities Modules Taught CS3230, Algorithms, (2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2018) CS4241, MultiMedia Information Systems, (2003, 2004, 2005) CS4236, Principle of Computer Security, (2006, 2007, 2008, 2010) CS4236, Cryptography Theory and Practice, (2012, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2020) CS6230, Topics in Information Security, (2006) CS5231, Cryptographic Techniques and Data Security, (2007, 2009) CS1231, Discrete Structures, (2008) CS5321, Network Security and Management, (2009, 2011, 2013) CS2107, Introduction to Information Security, (2014 - 2024) DTS5735, Cybersecurity, (2018 - 2024) Research supervison Research Fellow (duration and last known position) Ning Jianting, 2017-2019, Professor, Fujian Normal University.
